text: anal timaiyaic campatippavarkalukku, (avarkal ceyta) timaikkuk kuliyaka atuponra timaiyakum! Avarkalai ilivu culntu kollum; avarkalai allahvin (tantanaiyai) vittuk kapparrupavar evarumilar; irunta irulaiyutaiya iravin orupakam avarkal mukankalaic culntu carrik kollappattatu pol (avarkalin) mukankal kanappatum. Avarkal naraka neruppukku uriyavarkal. Avarkal ankeye enrenrum irupparkal
